desc: Your mother watched over your training since childhood. As a result, your body is in a great condition.
You inherited your mother's strength. Melee weapons deal more damage than usual.
Due to your unusual heritage you have additional supply of health, vitality and mp.
Due to liquid structure your body can sustain significant damage by quickly replacing damaged body tissues with unimportant undamaged ones.
You know a lot about lesbians from your Amazon mother. Lesbian characters will not reject you due to your gender, and your oral skill is pretty good.
Your mother was a muscular woman with huge knockers. Fortunately, you have inherited only her muscles.
Noble blood gives you certain perks.
The dragon blood is too thin to influence the looks, but it still makes melee weapons effective against you.
Your body is covered with tiny flakes. They are almost inconspicuous, but upon impact they become solid as stone, softening the blow.
Your body is covered with tiny flakes. They are almost inconspicuous, but at higher temperatures they actively absorb and dissipate heat, making fire and, to some extent, electricity ineffective.
Defense given by armor is a bit higher than usual.
All swords are a bit more powerful than usual.
The more expensive equipped items, the more attack they give.
All bows are a bit more powerful than usual.
All ranged attacks are stronger, but all melee attacks are weaker.
All daggers are a bit more powerful than usual.
All defense bonuses from equipment are lower, but all attack bonuses are higher.
Most ranged weapons don't give penalties to defense.
Equipment gives additional defense based on its price.
All shields are a bit more powerful than usual.
Most ranged weapons give bonus to magic equal to half of their bonus to attack.
Characters with Half-Sister trait will not reject you due to kinship and will have additional disposition bonus.
Your mother was an elf from the deep bowels of the earth. You have inherited some of her mobility and flexibility.
You know a lot about poisons from your mother. Poison are much less effective against you, and your poison attacks much are stronger.
You inherited your mother's affinity to the nature. Healing spells work better on you, while earth and wind deal less damage.
All Fae are naturally resistant to most forms of magic. Magic is not very effective against you, including healing spells.
Your body inherited some of your mother's unchangeability. Your body restores 1/3 of health every day, but healing items are less effective.
Your body inherited some of your mother's unchangeability. Your body restores 1/3 of mp every day, but items that restore it are less effective.
You inherited some of your mother's mystic powers. Fire and Light are not very effective against you.
Your Fae inheritance gives you aura of life which regenerates some health for you and all characters under your command every day and makes them a bit happier.
Hollow bones make you weaker against physical attacks, but light body weight completely neutralizes any equipment penalties to agility.
The wind itself is your ally. It makes Air magic ineffective against you and more powerful against your enemies, and weakens enemies ranged attacks.
All consumables that restore vitality are more effective, especially food.
All consumables that restore mp are more effective, especially alcohol.
Dragons have perfect distance vision, and so do you. Slightly increases critical damage.
Harpies are one of the fastest fliers in the world. You inherited some of your mother's speed.
You are immune to poisons, but darkness damages you a but more than others.
All attacks and magic are less effective against you, but all your attacks and magic are less effective too.
Ranged attacks are not effective against you, but on the other hand melee weapons are very dangerous.
Physical damage is less effective against you, but you cannot take virginity during intimacy due to your illusive state.
Due to vampiric heritage you are fast and very competent in Darkness magic, but your Light spells are very weak.
Darkness spells heal you instead of hurting, but your Light spells are almost ineffective.
Light spells heal you instead of hurting, but your Darkness spells are almost ineffective.
Fire spells heal you instead of hurting, but your Ice spells are almost ineffective.
Ice spells heal you instead of hurting, but your Fire spells are almost ineffective.
Electricity spells heal you instead of hurting, but your Water spells are almost ineffective.
Water spells heal you instead of hurting, but your Electricity spells are almost ineffective.
Healing spells don't affect you, but your vitality cannot become zero no matter what.
Most consumables that usually don't restore mp do it for you when you consume them.
Girls whose virginity was taken by you are more obedient.
You inherited your mother's reflexes, which helps to evade attacks. Sadly, mortal body is not suitable for vampire speed, which affected you health.
Due to your foxy heritage you possess more magical energy than others.
You are not just fill of magic energy, you can also share it with others. Most intimacy actions restore a great deal of magic energy for your partner.
The winter itself gives you powers. You may have less mp than others, but it cannot become zero no matter what.
